title: Our resource centre - Bioforce
content: En Fr Bioforce News Recruitment Log in bioforce learn trainings build missions share contributions learn OUR RESOURCE CENTRE In the regional centre for Europe 4,750 publications, 80 periodicals, topical and country files, a video library and over 2,000 humanitarian mission reports! A specialist document collection on humanitarian work Humanitarian work and human rights, programmes run by humanitarian organisations, international relations, economics, social and cultural issues, health, environment, agriculture, and more. If you are interested in discovering a humanitarian mission from the inside, and learning more about the different professions, come and take a look at one of the 2,000 mission reports written by Bioforce students and delve right into the heart of daily life on assignment. Resource centre partners Ritimo, a network of resource and information centres on development and international aid. Sciences Po Lyon and its database Sign@l, which lists the content of reviews on humanities and social sciences. Mir@bel, a network showcasing content from scientific periodicals available online. Home page Learn Our training centres Regional training centre for Europe Our resource centre Subscribe to our newsletter 41 Avenue du 8 Mai 1945 69200 Vénissieux Bioforce has been working as a non-profit organisation, serving the public interest since 1983.
